item.description:
Spring Events Planning

Safety Discussion on Safety Gear To Fly With

Got a favorite life vest or survival kit? Bring it for show and tell!

! Updates on local flying events, our fly outs and more.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

As always, food at 6:00 and meeting at 7:00.

Where else can you have this much excitement for $30bucks a year?

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site
